members.description: If true, the width of the popUp control is set to the value of the PopUpAnchor's width.
If true, adds the popUp control to the PopUpManager. If false, it removes the control.

The IFlexDisplayObject to add to the PopUpManager when the PopUpAnchor is opened. If the popUp control implements IFocusManagerContainer, the popUp control will have its own FocusManager. If the user uses the Tab key to navigate between controls, only the controls in the popUp control are accessed.
Position of the popUp control when it is opened, relative to the PopUpAnchor component. Possible values are "left", "right", "above", "below", "center", and "topLeft".
